model

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Inventory

  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    The Inventory class represents a list of all parts/products. This class contains several methods to access the private Observable List.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      Inventory()

      The addProduct method adds a new product to the allProducts list.

      The autoGenPartId generates a new part ID starting at 1000

      The autoGenProductId generates a new part ID starting at 2000

      The deletePart method deletes a part when selected in a table.

      The deleteProduct method deletes a product when selected in a table.

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart(java.lang.String partName)
        This overloaded lookupPart method searches through the allParts list by name.

        Returns:
        searchedPart The entered name if found

        Returns:
        searchedProduct The entered name if found

      • updatePart

        public static void updatePart(int index,
                              Part selectedPart)
        The updatePart method updates the part with new values from the Modify screen.
        Parameters:
        selectedPart - Highlighted part from Parts Table to modify
        index - The index of the selected part

      • updateProduct

        public static void updateProduct(int index,
                                 Product newProduct)
        The updateProduct method updates the product with new values from the Modify screen.
        Parameters:
        newProduct - Product with new associated parts
        index - The index of the selected program

      • deletePart

        public static boolean deletePart(Part selectedPart)
        The deletePart method deletes a part when selected in a table.
        Parameters:
        selectedPart - Highlighted part from Parts Table to delete
        Returns:
        false Allows the delete command to be ignored if nothing is selected

      • deleteProducts

        public static boolean deleteProducts(Product selectedProduct)
        The deleteProduct method deletes a product when selected in a table.
        Parameters:
        selectedProduct - Highlighted part from Products Table to delete
        Returns:
        false Allows the delete command to be ignored if nothing is selected

      • getAllParts

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getAllParts()
        The getAllParts method returns the allParts list.
        Returns:
        allParts The Observable List of all the parts

      • getAllProducts

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getAllProducts()
        The getAllProducts method returns the allProducts list.
        Returns:
        allProducts The Observable List of all the products

      • autoGenPartId

        public static int autoGenPartId()
        The autoGenPartId generates a new part ID starting at 1000
        Returns:
        partIdCount The part ID number from 1000

      • autoGenProductId

        public static int autoGenProductId()
        The autoGenProductId generates a new part ID starting at 2000
        Returns:
        productIdCount The product ID number from 2000
